title: internet diary found in forest
body:

school annoucment

hello parents we will extend the day to start at 1 AM and end at 12 AM. Here will be every day from then on but thats only for kinder because the rest of the grades will spend THEIR ENTIRE LIFE IN THIS SCHOOL WITH NO ESCAPE AND IF THEY DECIDE TO DIOBEY US THEY WILL SUFFER FOR MORE THEN THEIR ENTIRE LIFE WE WILL LOCK THEM IN A CELL WHERE THEY WILL STARVE TO DEATH THEN WE WILL SEND THEM TO HELL

5:42 breakfeast

11:23 nothing fun for a long time lol this school is out of ideas ummm billy can you think of a idea? Why am I typing this?

thank you for reading our new class thing lol we suck really bad I don't know how we are not sued yet lol
